title: Hussein, Crown Prince of Jordan
summary: Hussein bin Abdullah (Arabic: الحسين بن عبدالله‎, Al-Ḥusayn ibn ʿAbdullāh; born 28 June 1994) is Crown Prince of Jordan as the son of King Abdullah II. As a member of the Hashemite dynasty, the royal family of Jordan since 1921, he is a 42nd-generation direct descendant of the prophet Muhammad.
